site_name: Development Site Bounded By Ebury Street, Pimlico Road, Avery Farm Row, Ebury Square And
description: Request for a scoping opinion under Regulation 15 of The Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017 for demolition of Cundy Street flats and Walden House and redevelopment  to provide approximately 160 residential units and 90 Senior Living residential units with commercial space within retail and leisure (Use Class A1 and/or A3) and cinema (Use Class D2).  The Development is envisaged to comprise three key blocks ranging from six storeys on the west side of the site, rising to 11-storeys on the east side adjacent to Ebury Square Gardens. (Maximum height will be 48.8 m Above Ordnance Datum (AOD). The Development will provide approximately 48 car parking spaces, new public realm and new pedestrian routes through the site.
